sim.app.noc3d
Class NodeElement

java.lang.Object
  sim.app.noc3d.NodeElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class NodeElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable

The NodeElement class is used to create node elements. Which are the nodes in the network. Here the step method is called during the schedule and for each call the statements get executed and prints the number of packets present at the node during that time.

Author:
mankas
